column1: % Values calculated from an average of the capacity factors of the technologies within each subsector

% Exceptions: (1) For "m Solar" capacity factor the CSP_storage capacity factor value of 0.65 was excluded from the average. (2) The "k Hydro" capacity factor was sourced from Global CCS Institute "Renewable power generation costs in 2012: an overview" - 5.2 Capacity factors for hydropower, since hydropower is calculated endogenously within GCAM. (3) No cogeneration capacity factor "n CHP" was given.
